h1_title: How to Find All Buddha's Eyes Locations and Unlock Secret Boss
h2_title: How to Use the Buddha’s Eyeballs to Unlock the Secret Boss
h3_title: Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang
content: If you find yourself having trouble with the Stone Vanguard, it is possible to get some assistance from the Shigandang in an unexpected way!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Find_All_Buddha's_Eyes_Locations_and_Unlock_Secret_Boss.md', within the main section titled 'How to Find All Buddha's Eyes Locations and Unlock Secret Boss', specifically from the subsection 'How to Use the Buddha’s Eyeballs to Unlock the Secret Boss' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Defeat the Stone Vanguard with the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
If you find yourself having trouble with the Stone Vanguard, it is possible to get some assistance from the Shigandang in an unexpected way!
